title: Julie's scratch pad
body:
RYAN: This sentence is in the other section but NOT linked. I am repeating it here WITH the link: 

To better understand how to protect your sites from a Panda penalty, read Searchmetrics post [5 ways to definitely get hit by a Panda algorithm penalty](https://blog.searchmetrics.com/us/2014/09/23/5-ways-to-definitely-get-hit-by-a-panda-algorithm-penalty/).
